thread.section_title: Life Ionizers Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Life Ionizers | lifeionizers.com
thread.title: Christy Lim
thread.title_full: Life Ionizers reviewed by Christy Lim

author: Christy Lim
title: Christy Lim
text:
I have been using the ionizer for over a year and I am so glad that I made the decision to get it. We have been enjoying the water from the ionizer so much and no longer need to purchase bottled water, tremendously reducing the recycling, which I am very proud of as well. Water fromt he ionizer tastes so good and everyone in my family carries the water bottle, to school, gym, etc. We enjoy not only clean and healthy water but also will save money in the long run. The set-up was easy, and the customer service has been great, making things a lot easier.
I strongly recommend to anyone who is interested~
